location.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州山景城

description.zh-cn: 总部位于美国加州山景城的跨国科技公司，为Alphabet（字母控股）的子公司，业务范围涵盖互联网广告、互联网搜索、云计算等领域。
description.en: A multinational technology company headquartered in Mountain View, California, United States, and a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc. Its business scope covers internet advertising, internet search, cloud computing, and other fields.

description.zh-cn: 美国计算机科学家和企业家，与谢尔盖·布林共同创建了Google。
description.en: American computer scientist and internet entrepreneur who co-founded Google with Sergey Brin.

description.zh-cn: 美国计算机科学家和企业家，与拉里·佩奇共同创建了Google。
description.en: American computer scientist and internet entrepreneur who co-founded Google with Larry Page.

description.zh-cn: 一家位于美国的控股公司，于2015年由Google重组而成，并成为Google的母公司。
description.en: An American holding company formed through the restructuring of Google in 2015, becoming Google's parent company.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加州斯坦福的一所私立研究型大学，Google的两位创始人在此攻读博士期间创建了公司。
description.en: A private research university in Stanford, California, where the two founders of Google created the company while pursuing their Ph.D.s.

description.zh-cn: 印度裔美国商业主管，现任Google的首席执行官。
description.en: Indian-American business executive who is the chief executive officer of Google.

description.zh-cn: 美国商人及软件工程师，曾任Google的首席执行官和执行董事长。
description.en: American businessman and software engineer, former CEO and Executive Chairman of Google.

description.zh-cn: Sun Microsystems的联合创始人，Google最早的投资者之一。
description.en: Co-founder of Sun Microsystems and one of the first investors in Google.

description.zh-cn: 美国风险投资公司，曾早期投资Google。
description.en: American venture capital firm that was an early investor in Google.

description.zh-cn: 美国风险投资公司，曾早期投资Google。
description.en: American venture capital firm that was an early investor in Google.

description.zh-cn: 一个在线视频分享网站，于2006年被Google收购。
description.en: An online video-sharing website acquired by Google in 2006.

description.zh-cn: 一家高科技企业，于2005年被Google收购，其开发的移动操作系统成为Google的主要产品之一。
description.en: A technology company acquired by Google in 2005, whose mobile operating system became one of Google's main products.

description.zh-cn: 一家电信设备制造商，于2011年被Google收购。
description.en: A telecommunications equipment manufacturer acquired by Google in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国消费电子和健身公司，以其同名的活动追踪器而闻名，于2019年被Alphabet宣布收购。
description.en: An American consumer electronics and fitness company known for its activity trackers of the same name, announced to be acquired by Alphabet in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。由于网络审查制度，Google的搜索服务于2010年退出其大陆市场。
description.en: A country in East Asia. Due to its internet censorship policies, Google's search service withdrew from its mainland market in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 指Google公司因内容审查问题与中国政府谈判破裂，最终于2010年3月23日宣布停止在中国大陆的搜索服务并将其重定向至香港服务器的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event where Google, after failed negotiations with the Chinese government over content censorship, announced on March 23, 2010, the cessation of its search services in mainland China and redirected them to its Hong Kong servers.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府在其管辖互联网内部建立的多套网络审查系统的总称，用于过滤网络内容和屏蔽特定网站，包括Google的服务。
description.en: The collective term for the internet censorship systems established by the government of the People's Republic of China within its jurisdiction, used to filter web content and block specific websites, including Google's services.

description.zh-cn: 韩国跨国企业集团，与Google共同开发Android XR操作系统。
description.en: A South Korean multinational conglomerate that co-developed the Android XR operating system with Google.

description.zh-cn: 由Google和三星共同开发的扩展现实(XR)设备操作系统。
description.en: An operating system for extended reality (XR) devices, co-developed by Google and Samsung.

description.zh-cn: 拉里·佩奇与谢尔盖·布林共同创建了Google。
description.en: Larry Page co-founded Google with Sergey Brin.

description.zh-cn: 谢尔盖·布林与拉里·佩奇共同创建了Google。
description.en: Sergey Brin co-founded Google with Larry Page.

description.zh-cn: 2015年，Google宣布进行资产重组，划归新成立的母公司Alphabet Inc.底下。
description.en: In 2015, Google announced a corporate restructuring, becoming a subsidiary of the newly formed parent company, Alphabet Inc.

description.zh-cn: 在2015年Google重组为Alphabet的子公司后，桑德尔·皮蔡接任成为Google的首席执行官。
description.en: After Google's restructuring into a subsidiary of Alphabet in 2015, Sundar Pichai became the CEO of Google.

description.zh-cn: 在斯坦福大学攻读理学博士期间与谢尔盖·布林共同创建了Google。
description.en: Co-founded Google with Sergey Brin while pursuing a Ph.D. in science at Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 在斯坦福大学攻读理学博士期间与拉里·佩奇共同创建了Google。
description.en: Co-founded Google with Larry Page while pursuing a Ph.D. in science at Stanford University.

description.zh-cn: 曾出任Google首席执行官，后由拉里·佩奇接替。
description.en: Served as CEO of Google before being succeeded by Larry Page.

description.zh-cn: 在卸任首席执行官后，埃里克·施密特改任Google执行董事长。
description.en: After stepping down as CEO, Eric Schmidt became the Executive Chairman of Google.

description.zh-cn: 在Google公司成立前，向其创始人提供了十万美元的种子资金。
description.en: Provided $100,000 in seed funding to the founders before Google was officially incorporated.

description.zh-cn: 作为早期投资者，向Google注资两千五百万美元。
description.en: As an early investor, injected $25 million into Google.

description.zh-cn: 作为早期投资者，向Google注资两千五百万美元。
description.en: As an early investor, injected $25 million into Google.

description.zh-cn: Google于2006年10月宣布以16.5亿美元收购YouTube，交易于11月完成。
description.en: Google announced the acquisition of YouTube for $1.65 billion in October 2006, and the deal was finalized in November.

description.zh-cn: Google于2005年收购了成立仅22个月的高科技企业Android。
description.en: In 2005, Google acquired the 22-month-old technology company Android.

description.zh-cn: Google于2011年8月15日宣布以约125亿美元收购摩托罗拉移动。
description.en: On August 15, 2011, Google announced its acquisition of Motorola Mobility for approximately $12.5 billion.

description.zh-cn: Alphabet于2019年11月宣布以21亿美元收购可穿戴设备公司Fitbit。
description.en: In November 2019, Alphabet announced the acquisition of wearable device company Fitbit for $2.1 billion.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府的网络审查制度是导致谷歌退出中国事件的主要原因。
description.en: The internet censorship policies of the People's Republic of China were the primary cause of Google's withdrawal from China.

description.zh-cn: 该事件的最终结果是Google停止在中国大陆的搜索服务，将google.cn重定向至google.com.hk。
description.en: The ultimate result of this event was Google ceasing its search services in mainland China and redirecting google.cn to google.com.hk.

description.zh-cn: 防火长城持续对Google在中国的各项服务进行屏蔽和干扰。
description.en: The Great Firewall continuously blocks and interferes with Google's various services in China.

description.zh-cn: Google与三星合作开发并发布了Android XR操作系统。
description.en: Google co-developed and released the Android XR operating system with Samsung.

description.zh-cn: 三星与Google合作开发并发布了Android XR操作系统。
description.en: Samsung co-developed and released the Android XR operating system with Google.

description.zh-cn: Google与三星共同开发了扩展现实(XR)设备操作系统Android XR。
description.en: Google and Samsung jointly developed the Android XR operating system for extended reality (XR) devices.
